definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: It suggested that CHA had good osteogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 表明CHA有良好的成骨作用。

sentences.english: The healing of fracture mainly is the acceleration of osteogenic activities and endochondral ossification.
sentences.chinese: 骨折癒合主要是成骨活動及軟骨內化骨加速。

sentences.english: BMP plays an important role in the course of distraction osteogenesis.
sentences.chinese: BMP在骨延長成骨過程中發揮着重要作用。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of pamidronate for osteogenesis imperfecta.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結帕米膦酸鈉在成骨不全症中的應用經驗。

sentences.english: The experiment of implanting expression product in mouse muscle proved heterotopic bone formation.
sentences.chinese: 並進行表達產物小鼠肌肉內埋置活性成骨實驗。

sentences.english: Conclusion Medical grade calcium sulfate (Osteoset) is an ideal bone graft substitute with excellent bone repair effect.
sentences.chinese: 結論醫用硫酸鈣是一種成骨性能優良的骨移植材料。

sentences.english: Objective To study cellular compatibility and bone-inducing activity of the plasma sprayed wollastonite coating.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究硅灰石塗層的細胞相容性和成骨誘導能力。

sentences.english: Oil red staining and alizarin red staining both demonstrated positive reactions but not in control groups.
sentences.chinese: 成骨誘導後茜素紅染色陽性，對照組爲陰性。

sentences.english: RTI tests each batch of materials for its osteoblastic induction potential.
sentences.chinese: RTI會對每一批材料的成骨誘導潛力進行測試。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the osteogenesis of partially decacified bone in repairing bone defects.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討部分脫鈣骨修復骨缺損的成骨作用。

sentences.english: To investigate in vitro osteogenic possibility of bone marrow stem cells in fibrin gel.
sentences.chinese: 探索骨髓間充質細胞在纖維膠內體外成骨的可行性。

definition: mesenchymal stem cell MSC (in cell biology)
pinyin: jian1 chong1 zhi4 gan4 xi4 bao1
